steps: Power ON; use the cluster/menu buttons to enter the service/diagnostic menu; open Faults/Errors; capture active and stored codes with timestamps.
notes: Wording varies across EFG/ETV; confirm per manual.

steps: Key ON; locate diagnostic connector near main controller; connect Jungheinrich-compatible diagnostic tool; read active/stored fault codes; document fault conditions
notes: Follow manufacturer procedures for scan tool selection
